name: Vinsmoke Yonji
text: Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) If all of the Characters on your field have a type that includes "GERMA", this Character cannot be K.O'd or rested by your opponent's effects.

effect.text: After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.
If all of the Characters on your field have a type that includes "GERMA", this Character cannot be K.O'd or rested by your opponent's effects.
